column5: Seems like the day for helping.. I was emailed this.. I dont know.. but I thought someone here might!!    Anybody got any ideas??
I'm dry on this one, boss.
Doesn't ring any bells for me either but there are hundreds of resorts in the area.
I seem to recall a Lynx Lake reserve, or preserve somewhere in N.Kawartha's or Haliburton. They managed several small, natural lakes with some pretty big stocked brook trout.
I've lived and worked in the area for almost 11 years now, I sell cleaning supplies to the hospitality industry...and I don't have a clue...doesn't ring a bell at all.
Sorry, haven't heard of any with that name...
I'll second Solo's answer. I remember seeing a show with Bob Izumi fishing in that area and Lynx Lake reserve rings a bell. It might have been a fly in only though, not sure.  Cheers, 1leg
